alert.note: Alert for Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 12:00AM MDT until May 12 at 12:30AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LYMAN COUNTY... At 100 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oacoma, or 8 miles northwest of Chamberlain, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Lower Brule, Oacoma, Reliance, Medicine Butte, Counselor Creek Boat Access Area, Dude Ranch, Lyman, Lake Francis Case, Lake Sharpe, Lower Brule Reservation and Crow Creek Reservation. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
